job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
     * Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
     * Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
     * Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
     * Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
     * Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
     * Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
     * Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
job_details.full_text:
C++ Software Engineer - Automation & AI

* Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
     * Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
     * Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
     * Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
     * Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
     * Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
     * Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
     * Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional C++ software development, including design, development, testing, and maintenance of existing software (NX CAM). While 'AI' is mentioned in the title, the responsibilities and technologies listed do not indicate a focus on building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models, nor do they involve core ML engineering tasks like predictive modeling or MLOps. The role appears to be a traditional software engineering position that may *use* AI tools or integrate with AI systems, rather than developing or engineering AI itself, aligning with the 'Ambiguous' profile for non-AI technical roles or roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools.

job_tasks.justification: The description details core software engineering activities such as designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining software (NX CAM), creating and testing feature components, and applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with a Product Owner to build and refine user stories and acceptance tests involves understanding business requirements and translating them into technical specifications.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.

job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and frequent code review are practices aimed at improving code quality and design in software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.

job_tasks.justification: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment are key aspects of team collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.

job_tasks.justification: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation is a core tenet of building high-quality software.
job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.

job_tasks.justification: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge demonstrates collaborative teamwork and knowledge transfer.
job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
